title: Worlds of IF (February 1974)
description: The writings of Lester Del Rey have been removed due to a request by John Betancourt of Wildside Press. (Contents information excerpted from The Internet Speculative Fiction Database ) Art: The Ginger Star (Part 1 of 2) by Jack Gaughan Mistaken for Granted by Jack Gaughan If Ever I Should Leave You by Jack Gaughan Eye of the Storm by Jack Gaughan Transplant by Jack Gaughan Continuous Performance by Jack Gaughan Essay: Reading Room (If, January-February 1974) by Lester del Rey Novella: Mistaken for Granted by Hal Clement Serial: The Ginger Star (Part 1 of 2) by Leigh Brackett Short Stories: If Ever I Should Leave You by Pamela Sargent Eye of the Storm by Norman Spinrad Transplant by Christopher Priest Continuous Performance by Gordon Eklund
